function.name: applybs
function.description: Returns the result of applying the function f to each subband of the wavelet packet basis b comprising the coefficients in w. b is a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a packet basis.

function.name: applytbl
function.description: Returns a new wavelet packet table by applying the function f to each subband of the wavelet packet table T.

function.name: basis_display2d
function.description: Creates a matrix for graphically displaying 2-dimensional basis b.

function.name: best_basis
function.description: Returns the best packet basis from a packet table T, based on the additive cost function f.

function.name: bl
function.description: Returns the Battle-Lemarie wavelet based upon the degree n cardinal B-spline. n is an integer bewtween 0 and 6.

function.name: Bspline
function.description: Returns the analysis and synthesis low-pass filters for a spline-based biorthogonal wavelet. m is 1, 2, or 3. When m=1, n is an odd number between 1 and 5. When m=2, n is an even number between 2 and 8. When m=3, n is an odd number between 1 and 9.

function.name: coiflet
function.description: Returns the low-pass filter of the n-coefficient Coiflet wavelet. n is 6, 12, 18, 24, or 30.

function.name: cpt
function.description: Returns the n-level local cosine packet table for the data array a, using the default trig data taper function.

function.name: create_level
function.description: Returns a d-dimensional wavelet packet basis of all wavelet packets at the level n.

function.name: daublet
function.description: Returns the low-pass filter of the n-coefficient minimum phase Daubechies wavelet. n is an even integer between 2 and 20.

function.name: dlfather
function.description: Returns the value at x of the dual father wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position k. If j and k are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: dlfather2d
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the 2D dual father wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position (kx,ky). If j, kx, and ky are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: dlmother
function.description: Returns the value at x of the dual mother wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position k. If j and k are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: dlmother2d
function.params: x, y, [j, kx, ky], s, ds
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the 2D dual mother wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position (kx,ky). String ds is either "H", "V", or "D", and indicates either the horizontal, vertical, or diagonal mother wavelet. If j, kx, and ky are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: dlwavelet
function.description: Returns the value at x of the nth dual wavelet packet based on the filter f at scale j and position k. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: dlwavelet2d
function.params: x, y, j, kx, ky, m, n, f, [o, [i]]
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the (m,n)th dual wavelet packet based on filter f at scale j and position (kx,ky). f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: dwt
function.description: Returns the n-level wavelet transform of the array a by the wavelet filter f. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: dwti
function.description: Returns the n-level interval wavelet transform of the array a by the wavelet filter f. f is a vector returned by daublet or symmlet.

function.name: dwts
function.description: Returns the n-level symmetric wavelet transform of the array a by the wavelet filter f. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix returned by bl, Bspline, or daublet(2).

function.name: evalbs
function.description: Returns the result of applying the function f to each subband of the wavelet packet basis b comprising the coefficients in w. b is a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a packet basis.

function.name: evaltbl
function.description: Returns the result of applying the function f to each subband of the wavelet packet table T.

function.name: extract_basis
function.description: Returns coefficients in the basis specified by b from a 1D or 2D packet table T.

function.name: father
function.description: Returns the value at x of the father wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position k. If j and k are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: father2d
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the 2D father wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position (kx,ky). If j, kx, and ky are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: get_detail
function.description: Returns the result of extracting the index-1 block of wavelet packet coefficients at level l from the wavelet packet transform w.

function.name: get_detail2d
function.description: Returns the result of extracting the subband indicated by the string ds of wavelet packet coefficients at level l from the 2-dimensional wavelet packet transform M. ds is either "H", "V", or "D", and indicates either the index-(1,0), index-(0,1), or index-(1,1) subband.

function.name: get_smooth
function.description: Returns the result of extracting the 0th block of wavelet packet coefficients at level l from the wavelet packet transform w.

function.name: get_smooth2d
function.description: Returns the result of extracting the (0,0)th subband of wavelet packet coefficients at level l from the 2-dimensional wavelet packet transform M.

function.name: get_subband
function.description: Returns the nth block of wavelet packet coefficients at level l extracted from the wavelet packet transform w. w is a vector.

function.name: get_subband2d
function.description: Returns the result of extracting the (m,n)th subband of wavelet packet coefficients at level l from the 2-dimensional wavelet packet transform M. M is an array.

function.name: icpt
function.description: If w is an array of cosine packet coefficients constructed from a cosine packet table with n levels, returns the inverse cosine packet transform with respect to the basis specified by b, using the default trig data taper function. b is a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a cosine packet basis.

function.name: idwt
function.description: Returns the n-level inverse wavelet transform of the array a by the wavelet filter f. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: idwti
function.description: Returns the n-level inverse interval wavelet transform of the array a by the wavelet filter f. f is a vector returned by daublet or symmlet.

function.name: idwts
function.description: Returns the n-level inverse symmetric wavelet transform of the array a by the wavelet filter f. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix returned by bl, Bspline, or daublet(2).

function.name: ilct
function.description: If w is an array of cosine packet coefficients constructed from a cosine packet table with n levels, returns the inverse cosine packet transform with respect to the basis specified by b, using data taper function f. b is a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a cosine packet basis.

function.name: iwpt
function.description: Returns the inverse wavelet packet transform of the array w with respect to basis b by the wavelet filter f. b is a 2- or-3-column matrix representing a packet basis. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: iwpti
function.description: Returns the inverse interval wavelet packet transform of the array w with respect to basis b by the wavelet filter f. b is a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a packet basis. f is a vector.

function.name: iwpts
function.description: Returns the inverse symmetric wavelet packet transform of the array w with respect to basis b by the wavelet filter f. b is a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a packet basis. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix.

function.name: lct
function.description: Returns the n-level local cosine packet table for the data array a using data taper function f.

function.name: mother
function.description: Returns the value at x of the mother wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position k. If j and k are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: mother2d
function.params: x, y, [j, kx, ky], s, ds
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the 2D mother wavelet packet based on the filter represented by string s at scale j and position (kx,ky). String ds is either "H", "V", or "D", and indicates either the horizontal, vertical, or diagonal wavelet. If j, kx, and ky are omitted, they are assumed to be 0.

function.name: put_detail
function.description: Returns the result of inserting the vector y into the index-1 block of wavelet packet coefficients of w at level l.

function.name: put_detail2d
function.description: Returns the result of inserting the matrix N into the subband indicated by the string ds of wavelet packet coefficients at level l of the 2-dimensional wavelet packet transform M. ds is either "H", "V", or "D", and indicates either the index-(1,0), index-(0,1), or index-(1,1) subband.

function.name: put_smooth
function.description: Returns the result of inserting the vector y into the index-0 block of wavelet packet coefficients of w at level l.

function.name: put_smooth2d
function.description: Returns the result of inserting the matrix N into the index-(0,0) subband of wavelet packet coefficients at level l of the 2-dimensional wavelet packet transform M.

function.name: put_subband
function.description: Returns the result of inserting the vector y into the nth block of wavelet packet coefficients at level l of the wavelet packet transform w. w is a vector.

function.name: put_subband2d
function.description: Returns the result of inserting the matrix N into the (m,n)th subband of wavelet packet coefficients at level l of the 2-dimensional wavelet packet transform M. M is an array.

function.name: swaveterp
function.description: Returns the value at x of the symmetric multiresolution approximation of v corresponding to the nth subband at level j, based on the filter f. f is an array returned by bl, Bspline, or daublet(2).

function.name: swaveterp2d
function.params: x, y, v, j, m, n, f
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the symmetric multiresolution approximation of v corresponding to the (m,n) th subband at level j, based on the filter f. f is an array returned by bl, Bspline, or daublet(2).

function.name: symmlet
function.description: Returns the low-pass filter of the n-coefficient least asymmetric Daubechies wavelet. n is an even integer between 4 and 20.

function.name: wavebs
function.description: Returns the d-dimensional wavelet packet basis corresponding to the wavelet transform of level n.

function.name: wavelet
function.description: Returns the value at x of the nth wavelet packet based on filter f at scale j and position k. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: wavelet2d
function.params: x, y, j, kx, ky, m, n, f, [o, [i]]
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the (m,n)th wavelet packet based on filter f at scale j and position (kx,ky). f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: waveterp
function.description: Returns the value at x of the periodic multiresolution approximation of v corresponding to the nth subband at level j, based on the filter f. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: waveterp2d
function.params: x, y, v, j, m, n, f, [o, [i]]
function.description: Returns the value at (x,y) of the periodic multiresolution approximation of v corresponding to the (m,n) th subband at level j, based on the filter f. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have an offset o and negation i.

function.name: wpt
function.description: Returns the wavelet packet transform of the array a with respect to basis or level b by the wavelet filter f. b is either an integer or a 2-or-3-column matrix representing a packet basis. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix. f can have offset o and negation i.

function.name: wpti
function.description: Returns the interval wavelet packet transform of the array a with respect to basis or level b by the wavelet filter f. b is either an integer or a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a packet basis. f is a vector.

function.name: wpts
function.description: Returns the symmetric wavelet packet transform of the array a with respect to basis or level b by the wavelet filter f. b is either an integer or a 2- or 3-column matrix representing a packet basis. f is either a vector or a 2-column matrix.
